text:
A couple of weeks ago, I made a video asking
you to make me a video saying what you do.

“What do you do?” is a common question
asked in the US after you’ve met somebody.

You guys did a great job. I got over 50 responses.
You nailed it! I loved hearing about what
everybody does all over the world.

Thank you to those who also answered my question
about common questions people ask in your

country when you’ve just met. It was very
interesting. I learned that in some countries,

one of the first questions you ask somebody
is, “How old are you?” And just so you

know, that question would not be ok in the
US. It’s considered pretty rude. We are

terrified of aging in the US, so, we don’t
like to talk about it.
Um, without further ado, here they are. All of the videos you guys sent in.
The results of the "What do you do?" video challenge!
